name: LAST COLONY
description:
---------------------------------------------------------

Minimalistic turn based strategy game about building and defending a colony.

---------------------------------------------------------

LORE

After 700 years you have awoken from cryosleep in the orbit of your new home. Sensors are however showing some unusual readings on the surface.

Your homeworld exists no longer.
You do not have anywhere to return. The only option is to deal with whatever may be down there and start a new life on this alien planet...

---------------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES

  • Expand your colony using six different types of buildings.
  • Each playthrough is unique thanks to randomized map.
  • Defend your colony against enemy towers.
  • Destroy enemy structures and secure the planet.

---------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

  • Left click to select.
  • Right click to hide currently open UI elements.
  • Zoom using mouse wheel.
  • Move around the map as you move your cursor.
  • Press middle mouse button to lock/unlock camera position.
